title: How Do I Edit the Application List?
answer:
In non-editing mode, only applications with icons are displayed in the list. The number of applications
displayed in the list is not the actual number of applications on the phone.

 

 

In the top of application list, touch
 .
The screen shown in the following figure is displayed.
1. Touch and hold the icon, and drag it to any blank area of the current screen or to another
screen. If dragged to a blank area, the icon is moved to the new position, as shown in the
following figure.


2. If dragged onto another icon, the two icons will exchange positions, as shown in the following
figure.

 

 

Touch  to save the changes.

NOTE: 

In editing mode, the number of displayed applications in the list is the actual number of applications on
the phone. When an icon is moved, the icons in the application list are automatically aligned from left to
right and from top to bottom.
